text: Python Regular Expression Match All 5 Digit Numbers but None Larger
I'm attempting to string match 5-digit coupon codes spread throughout a HTML web page.
I can handle the simpler case of any string of 5 digits with [0-9]{5}, though this also matches 6, 7, 8... n digit numbers.
Can someone please suggest how I would modify this regular expression to match only 5 digit numbers?
